pageProduct.name: Sukin Brightening Jelly Exfoliator 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Passionfruit Seeds And Bromelain Deeply Exfoliate The Dull Surface Of The Skin To Promote A Smooth And Even Skin Tone.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Our Glow-Promoting Exfoliator Is Formulated With Kakadu Plum, A Natural Source Of Vitamin C, And Bromelain, A Natural Fruit Enzyme, To Gently Remove Impurities Revealing A Smoother And More Radiant Complexion. Passionfruit Seeds And Jojoba Gently Buff The Skin To Promote An Even And Dewy Skin Tone.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Pumice, Xanthan Gum, Jojoba Esters, Bromelain, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract (Kakadu Plum), Squalane, Passiflora Edulis Seed Powder (Passionfruit), Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Extract, Glucose, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Limonene** *Natural Fragrance **Component Of Natural Fragrance

Directions

Dampen Skin And Gently Massage In Light, Circular Motions. Remove With Warm Water. Use Once Or Twice A Week, Morning Or Night.
